job_tasks.phrase: het ontwerpen, ontwikkelen en optimaliseren van nieuwe AI-oplossingen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the creation and refinement of AI solutions, which falls under the core definition of model development and optimization.
Integrating AI solutions into existing business processes implies software development and system integration tasks.
This phrase explicitly mentions collaboration with diverse teams.
This phrase indicates the need to communicate findings to stakeholders, a key aspect of communication skills.

job_tasks.phrase: Continu blijven leren en ontwikkelen op het gebied van AI-technologieën en -methoden
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly emphasizes continuous learning and development in AI technologies, aligning with the definition of learning and adaptability.

soft_skills.phrase: Continu blijven leren en ontwikkelen op het gebied van AI-technologieën en -methoden

classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes the implementation of GenAI technologies and the development of new AI solutions. While there is mention of integrating into business processes, the core focus remains on the creation and optimization of AI applications, fitting the profile of a GenAI Engineer.
